snippet: Covers of the songs of others, and the stories of how he discovered them, were a large part of Lyle Lovett’s concert Tuesday at the New York Society for Ethical Culture.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by Lyle Lovett at the New York Society for Ethical Culture.
lead_paragraph: Covers of the songs of others, and the stories of how he discovered them, were a large part of Lyle Lovett’s concert Tuesday at the New York Society for Ethical Culture.

headline.seo: Lyle Lovett Concert Introduces ‘Release Me’ Album
headline.main: A Gathering of Good Friends With Lightning Fingers
headline.print_headline: A Gathering of Good Friends With Lightning Fingers
